sn29.5:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn29.5:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce samsedaja naga uposatham upavasanti vossatthakaya ca bhavanti”ti?
sn29.5:1.5: “Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yena m’idhekacce samsedaja naga uposatham upavasanti vossatthakaya ca bhavanti”ti.
